title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building an AI platform: Adaptive teaching to institutional auditing (WPS316)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建AI平台：从自适应教学到机构审计 (WPS316)
abstract: Join us to explore how Cornell University is reshaping higher education by building an AI platform to transform how teachers guide students to success and administrators operate. Cornell’s AI innovation Lab evaluates and implements 20+ AI use cases each semester using a “minimum lovable product” approach. We’ll showcase SandboxAI, a secure campus-wide platform built on AWS serverless architecture and integrated with Amazon Bedrock. Also discover how migrating analytics to Amazon Redshift unlocked significant cost savings and performance gains, directly fueling Cornell’s AI initiatives and broader institutional goals. Cornell’s journey offers a blueprint for innovation, efficiency, and governance at scale.
abstract_cn: 加入我们，探索康奈尔大学如何通过构建AI平台来重塑高等教育，改变教师指导学生成功的方式以及管理者的运营模式。康奈尔大学的AI创新实验室每学期采用"最小可爱产品"方法评估和实施20多个AI用例。我们将展示SandboxAI，这是一个基于AWS无服务器架构构建并与Amazon Bedrock集成的安全校园级平台。同时了解如何通过将分析迁移到Amazon Redshift实现显著的成本节约和性能提升，直接推动康奈尔大学的AI计划和更广泛的机构目标。康奈尔大学的实践为大规模创新、效率和治理提供了蓝图。
